reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress beautiful for beach wear and appreciate its comfortable fit, with one noting it accommodates a bump well. The dress is flattering on various body types and comes in multiple colors. While some it's made of good fabric and isn't see-through, others find the material isn't the best and can be see-through. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars My New Go-To Summer Maxi
items.body: I absolutely love this dress! The square neckline and spaghetti straps are so flattering, and the ruffle hem adds a fun boho touch. The A-line skirt flows beautifully and makes it feel light and effortless—perfect for beach days, summer soirées, or a cute brunch outing. The solid color makes it super versatile, and I’ve already gotten so many compliments wearing it. Highly recommend if you’re looking for a dress that’s stylish, comfy, and ready for warm weather vibes! Read more
items.author: Beatriz H

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect casual sundress
items.body: I bought this dress to wear to a casual rehearsal dinner. It was perfect, very comfortable and flattering. I ordered the black dress in a size small. I am 5’1” and 120 lbs. The dress was a perfect length and fell right above my ankles. When it arrived it was a little wrinkly, but after I washed/ironed it, it looked really nice. Good quality for the price. Read more
items.author: Meg Bell

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty black dress, love the tie straps. Good length.
items.body: The media could not be loaded. Super cute dress, purchased and worn on recent cruise. For reference, I am 5’5” 155# and ordered the medium. I really love this dress! It is the perfect length and flattering and forgiving when on. It is lined about halfway down, but fabric is opaque enough it is hard to tell. The only con is that the strap quality is rather poor. They all appear to be poorly sewn on and some are even pulling away from the bodice. I kept it and plan to just add a few stitches, but obviously that is something you should not have to do. That was the only disappointment with this dress and I liked it enough for the price to just correct it myself. Perfect vacation attire! Read more
items.author: Olivia Gray

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful green sre
items.body: Beautiful dress! The color is good, quality is good and overall a great dress. It came wrinkled since it was in an airtight package but unwrinkled easily with a steamer! It fits true to size. really happy with this product. Read more
items.author: summer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and comfy!
items.body: Cute dress and comfortable! I like that the straps are adjustable with the ties. Extremely easy to steam to get the wrinkles out. It did have a couple loose strings, but kind of expected for the price. Color and size are exact. Read more
items.author: Tracey Swearinger

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Ok dress, but not great
items.body: This dress was pretty, but it was kind of see through. It did not flatter me at all and I probably could have gone down a size because it was very stretchy. I ended up returning it since it did not work and I could not wear it. Read more
items.author: Mackenzie Hillman

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So cute for maternity pictures
items.body: This dress was perfect for our maternity session on the beach! I ordered my pre-pregnancy size and it fit perfectly and will continue to work with my growing bump and even postpartum! I will say make sure you steam the fabric as it does wrinkle easily, but it took me all of maybe 2 minutes to steam it perfect! Read more
items.author: Lauren | The Golden Dood Bros

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Disappointed
items.body: Super cute and great quality but the ties at the shoulder are an issue. It took about 20 min to get them halfway cute Read more
items.author: Jennifer Cochran

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Aqua, Rust, Blue, Watermelon, Royalblue, Apricot, Black, Sage, Dustyblue, Orange, Red, Peacock, Navy, Khaki. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
